projects.title: CRM Portal for Home Acquisition Management
projects.description: Building a scalable CRM portal by unifying legacy data into a common schema with a dashboard interface. Automating acquisition workflows with deadline tracking, reminders, and lead follow-through. Applying data insights and ML analysis to optimize acquisition strategies.

projects.title: fpdf, PyPdf2 Contributions
projects.description: Added documentation on integrating fpdf2 with the Ibis library for rendering Ibis DataFrames as tables in PDF documents. Provided best-practice installation instructions and a step-by-step example using Ibis with DuckDB and fpdf2.

projects.title: Multimodal IPO Binary Classification
projects.description: Built a neural network integrating RHP text, financial data, and market sentiment to predict IPO success. Created a RAG pipeline extracting targeted RHP sections via 25 domain-specific queries. Achieved 90% accuracy and 96% F1-score.
projects.affliatedOrganisation: Machine Learning and Pattern Recognition Course

projects.title: Energy Monitoring System
projects.description: Built a home energy monitoring system using time-series data from smart sockets and thermal regulators. Developed WhatsApp-based nudges and cost-prediction models to track and influence energy consumption behavior.

projects.title: Owlett
projects.description: Co-founded a website that simplified media articles in politics, economics, business, and social issues for youth audiences. Second runner-up in ENpower's India Future Tycoons Season 1. Student-led initiative with 20k+ views, 350+ articles, and 9 student writers. Please note: actual domain has been deprecated, this is just the wordpress skeleton

projects.title: RegExtract
projects.description: Automated solution to check targeted regulatory websites for changes in policy. Used DFS to scrape websites for PDFs, download and parse them, then compared with a baseline template using Gemini API for summarization.

projects.title: Golang Security Analysis Enhancements
projects.description: Contributed to Gosec, Golang's static analysis tool, by strengthening detection rules with refined file path taint checks (G304) and expanded SQL injection checks (G202). Fixed nil-context crashes and added coverage for edge cases.

projects.title: Website Development
projects.description: Designed and coded the website for the LEAP Artificial Intelligence club.

projects.title: Dark Pattern Detection Tool
projects.description: Designed a dark pattern detection tool to identify false urgency on websites. Used a Gemini API + Selenium scraper to extract DOM contents and features, continuing as a research project on temporal analysis of dark patterns.

projects.title: LeapDraw!
projects.description: Built a sketch recognition model based on Google's Quick, Draw! dataset using CNN. Attempted RNN for stroke-based recognition. Implemented with FastAPI backend and PyTorch/Keras model training.

projects.title: MediScene
projects.description: Medication tracker built at HackPlaksha. Static HTML/CSS frontend with minimal JS. Firebase Realtime Database for persistence and Express server to handle Firebase credential injection.

projects.title: Issue #34 Fix - Issue Match (Open Source Connect India)
projects.description: Resolved Issue #34 in Issue Match (Open Source Connect India) by fixing footer social links—removed placeholders, retained valid GitHub/email, replaced insecure <Link> with <a> tags, and addressed npm deprecation issues, improving usability and security.

projects.title: Cloudflare Registrar Docs Fix
projects.description: Improved Cloudflare registrar docs by fixing broken external links (Issues #24819, #24821), ensuring up-to-date, consistent, and reliable user documentation.
